reviews.text:
The ambience is amazing, I thought I am back to ancient time.

The singers are so entertaining, professional , we were attended by a warm service staff named Ms Claudin, she greeted us with a big smile on her face:) . We are having a great time !

Just visited for the first time and I'm loving the vibe! The atmosphere is vibrant and entertaining, and the staff are fantastic. Special shoutout to Claudin - she's incredibly helpful, friendly, and provided top-notch service. I'll definitely be bringing my friends back here again. Thanks, Claudin, for making our experience so great!

We had an amazing night at The Inn Livehouse @ Anson celebrating a friendâ€™s birthday, and I just had to give a shoutout to Huston, one of the best service staff we've ever encountered. From the moment we arrived, Huston made us feel truly welcome, attentive without being overbearing, always one step ahead in anticipating our needs, and incredibly friendly throughout the evening. He made sure our birthday celebration went smoothly, kept our drinks topped up, and even helped surprise our friend with a cake and a cheer from the team!

Thanks to Huston, the night was even more memorable. My friend and I left with big smiles and great memories. Highly recommend this place, especially if you're lucky enough to be served by Huston!
Good Ambience, nice and friendly staff especially Claudine. Thank you for being so cheerful and lively. Sweet smile you have there ðŸ˜¬

This venue offers an excellent atmosphere, characterized by a nostalgic retro charm. Itâ€™s an ideal setting for relaxation on weekdays and transforms into a lively and engaging spot on weekends. Itâ€™s easy to appreciate its unique appeal

The live bands are truly exceptional. Overall, the performers present themselves with great confidence, and their vocal performances are of outstanding quality. â€” I would highly recommend it.
